website_summaries.verdict: A massager that helps relieve sore, tired feet.
pros: Vibrates to help you gently massage your feet
Includes an Acu-Node surface that enables the massager to replicate the results provided by a deep-tissue massage
Easy to use at any time
cons: Vibration can be weak at times
More expensive than many similar massagers

customer_reviews.title: This is the second HoMedic percussion massager I bought (the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second HoMedic percussion massager I bought (the other is an EU standard) and it is the only remedy that has consistently helped me resolve plantar fasciitis throughout the years.
customer_reviews.author: Esme F.

customer_reviews.title: Cost
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for about 45 day then its stopped vibrating; I replaced the batteries and then the unit worked for about 2 the 3 day with very weak vibration, Then it stop vibrating. I still it after a work out, but mist not having the unit vibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Mildbill

customer_reviews.title: Worked less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Received May 24, 2018 and it worked great. Now, less than 3 months, it no longer works. I have 2 older ones that are still working fine. I just had to buy another one and hope this one works as good as the older ones.
customer_reviews.author: beasgrandma

customer_reviews.title: Nice little hand held massager
customer_reviews.text: I have sciatic nerve problems which makes my muscles tense in one leg. I have a big massager, but it was too heavy and cumbersome. This device is small enough and it is easier to handle. The heating head really only gets slightly warm. The wide head is nice for bigger areas.
customer_reviews.author: Juya

customer_reviews.title: Great for arm muscle & shouldet pain.....
customer_reviews.text: Love this for tight & sore muscles in my forearms & shoulders. My previous Homedics percussion massager (different model & somewhat different shape) cord went bad on me (friend fixed cord once & might again - eventually). Love the curved attachment for my arms - works with the contours of my arms. Old one lasted a long time & got a out of use.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A.

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as my original 10+ years ago
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these (very slightly smaller) for 10 or more years. After several "surgeries" to keep it running, it finally died. No one made one like it until Homemedics recently put it out again. Couldn't wait to buy it. The minute it got here, I took it out and used it to loosen up knots I had developed. OMG does it help. Powerful enough to do the job, but lightweight and small enough to hold without fatigue. I may have to buy another as a spare. I NEVER want to be without it again. Hope it lasts like the other.
customer_reviews.author: Redstickleaper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Does a good job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my massage collection. Orthopedic issues abound in this arthritic aging and still somewhat active body. I find it a bit heavy for me to use very long when applying to the neck area with weight lifting limits of 5 lbs in my left arm.
customer_reviews.author: WXYZ

customer_reviews.title: Really helps!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Helped me reduce pain within 3 days. Easy to hold and move. The heat element shuts down the motor within 5-10 minutes. Without that it goes for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Really helped with my wife's knotted up back. It is very easy and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: grampajay

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not intense as I had hope. I want to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice
customer_reviews.text: NEVER BUY OPEN BOX item not complete unable to try it out. Wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: mary koester

customer_reviews.title: The product broke down needed it for my wifes problem. Did not work well?
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea at first but motor stop working wanted to use the product to massage my wife. the product did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Works well, has lasted over a year, seems durable. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Galbreath

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this one is almost as good as the homedics palm percussion massager and last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the heat
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice and works well on pain. Love the heat feature. Added relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really gives you a deep tissue massage, the only bummer is you can't get your own back!
customer_reviews.author: D. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love that its easy enough to use..compact. I stand for long hours. Feels great to use at the end of the day on my lowerback
customer_reviews.author: Donna Painter

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I’m very unhappy with this product & want to return it !
customer_reviews.author: Dskee

customer_reviews.title: Its not the most comfortable tip. A little forgiveness on the ball tip ...
customer_reviews.text: The Pinpoint Massager by Homedics has the right idea for pressure point and trigger points. I'm a fibromyalgia endurer and this gadget gets to these trigger areas and helps release the spasm. Its not the most comfortable tip. A little forgiveness on the ball tip would be nice but it beats trying to lay on a tennis ball to achieve similar results. Works well on the back of the neck as well. It"s an odd configured contraption to reach hard to reach trigger points without having to wait for someone else to help.
customer_reviews.author: Judy R. Layman

customer_reviews.title: It is nowhere as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace any earlier model which had given up the ghost...It is nowhere as good as the original...One of the attachments doesn't even fit on it right...Otherwise it does provide the message that I need...
customer_reviews.author: tambourinemonkey66

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent for it's size
customer_reviews.text: I tried a Wahl from walmart. Might as well been using the backside of a razor. This is excellent for it's size!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Mackenroe

customer_reviews.title: Homedics massager
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Way too powerful which causes pain rather than relieving it. Could be the different power requirements in Australia v USA. Whatever. It is now in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Ayres

customer_reviews.title: First the box was totally ripped and crushed. When ...
customer_reviews.text: First the box was totally ripped and crushed. When I opened it to checkout my item, it has the end piece required to operate the vibrations missing!!! It’s totally unusable. I won’t order from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Nice massager
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a hand held massager for our neck and shoulder pain. This one is the perfect size and weight. I love the strap, it makes it easy to use by yourself. The other massagers have long handles and are heavy.
customer_reviews.author: wishes

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you going.
customer_reviews.text: I learn about this from my massage therapist. I need back surgery and can't do it now, the pain from sciatica goes across the back and down the legs. This helps with all the muscle tightness and helps to alleviate some of the pain.
customer_reviews.author: donna y.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Little Massager
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do a really good job of doing what it is intended to do. I really like the variable intensity control. I haven't tried the heat feature, so I can't give any feedback on that. I wanted something as small as possible that I could maneuver with one hand and this fills the bill. So far I am completely satisfied with it and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jld

customer_reviews.title: Great Massager
customer_reviews.text: This massager is great! I like the fact that you can adjust the speed easily to get the perfect vibration. The attachments are easy to change.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Barber

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay massager but doesn’t have enough power to really help with muscle recovery and blood flow. I can barely feel the vibration when using it on my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Decent device, but nowhere near the strength to really ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent device, but nowhere near the strength to really compress tissue. I guess for the price it's about right. The professional grade devices cost over 1k.
customer_reviews.author: Louise S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I've had the previous versions of this device for years, it's a good little massager, but not as powerful as the original units.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but didn't last for me
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a while. Bought in July, but broken by October...
customer_reviews.author: tim grossman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too fond of it, but my girlfriend loves it when she has knots in her back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Too big to work
customer_reviews.text: Much too big. Didnt know it vibrates. But barely shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Good results with this hand held devise with velcro strap.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as bulky as standard type vibrators that have a long handle and which are heavier and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis De Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should but doesn’t have the power like a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should but doesn’t have the power like a dual head unit would have. The power cord is to short.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: AT LAST...PAIN RELIEF!
customer_reviews.text: This is very powerful & works wonderfully to reduce pain & stiffness in my neck & shoulders. I gave it 4 stars only because it is a bit awkward for me to hold & guide. Had I realized that before I purchased it I probably would have opted for a wand model. But this works well enough that I won't return it.
customer_reviews.author: little girl blue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and this helps quite a bit. I use it every morning for 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

product_meta.title: Hydra Vibration Foot Massage Roller | Internal Water Chamber, Reflexology Pressure Points, HOT or Cold Massage | Sports Recovery, Heel & Foot Arch Relief | HoMedics
product_meta.description:
Style:SR-HCF

Since our beginnings in 1987, HoMedics has created, innovated and refined a remarkable line of personal wellness products to become the recognized #1 Brand in Massage. Our brand is about creating a healthy home environment that helps you relax your body, de-stress, and simplify your life. We are proud to be a leading innovator in massage technology today. Additionally, we carry a full line of in-home wellness products, including air filters, humidifiers, white noise machines, fitness monitors, aroma diffusers, and more.

Receive a stimulating foot massage from the HoMedics Hydra Vibration Foot Massage Roller. This massager uses a combination of vibration, HOT or COLD treatment, and Acu-Nodes to deliver a penetrating massage to tired, sore feet. Use warm water to help improve the blood circulation in your toes and feet. Use ice cold water after an intensive workout to speed up recovery and eliminate lactic acid buildup.

Our Hydra Foot Massager features an easy to use one button vibration control. Simply push the power button and place massager on the floor. Apply desired pressure and gently roll massager up and down the foot. Give your feet the relief they deserve - from the comfort of your own home or office. 

This massager makes a useful addition to any collection of sport recovery products.
feature_bullets: PAIN RELIEF: Stimulate tired feet with the specifically engineered Acu-Node surface. The Acu-Nodes mimic the feeling of a professional deep-tissue pressure point massage. Discomfort in the feet can affect the entire body and sour your mood. When foot discomfort disrupts your day, grab a quick, convenient massage from this lightweight and portable roller. Improve blood circulation and ease painful trigger points

EXERCISE MORE: Foot pain can have many negative impacts on your life beyond sore feet. Coping with foot pain can cause many small but unfortunate side effects on your daily life, e.g., choosing not to take an afternoon walk, postponing a scheduled run, or taking the escalator instead of the stairs. Instead, treat your foot pain with this fantastic Hydra vibrating HOT or COLD roller massager

LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE: You never know when you’re going to get a muscle cramp which is why HoMedics designed this foot roller to be lightweight and portable. Toss in a travel bag and bring it with you everywhere. Relieve stiff, sore feet at your office, home or the gym

EASY TO USE: Remove the battery cover by turning counter-clockwise. Insert 2 “AA” batteries (not included) into the chamber. Replace the cover by turning clockwise. Press the power button to activate the vibration feature. To fill the foot roller, open the chamber and fill with water. DO NOT fill with water over 110º F. Roll your foot over the massager. After completing your massage, press the power button again to turn the vibration off. Empty the water from the chamber and dry completely
WHAT’S INCLUDED WITH YOUR PURCHASE: One HoMedics Hydra Vibration Foot Massage Roller. One owner's manual
